Uses of Class
org.openide.text.Line.ShowOpenType

  • Packages that use Line.ShowOpenType 
    Package Description
    org.openide.text
    NetBeans is able to integrate multiple editors for different content types and mechanically access their content.

    • Uses of Line.ShowOpenType in org.openide.text

      Open the document associated with a file in the Editor window in a position specified by the offset while controlling open and visibility behavior.
